pages.text: This is the core of your rocket!

pages.name: Rocket Multi-block
pages.text: Make sure you place the $(item)Rocket Nose Cone/$ last!

pages.title: Fueling Your Rocket
pages.text: To fuel this voyage your gonna need the most potent source of energy available: lava. $(br)Just use the lava buckets on the rocket to fill it up (like a cauldron). $(p)The tank can hold $(thing)ten buckets of lava/$, which is enough for a trip to the moon and back.

pages.title: Troubleshooting
pages.text: If the rocket multi-block won't transform into the rocket entity: $(li)Try breaking and replacing the Rocket Nose Cone. $(li)Make sure you are using a Blast Furnace at the base of the rocket. $(li)Make sure the copper blocks have not become oxidized.
